attributes.action: ALL MP'S TO BE PAID NATIONAL AVERAGE WAGE
attributes.additional_details:
All MP's to be paid the current national average wage, Not only would this fairer to the tax paying public but also it would put MP's in a greater position of understanding to the struggles of the  average working person, enabling them to do a better job with a more genuine motivation.
Money directly effects peoples security, health and well being,
therefore no person should be entitled to hoard cash whilst others suffer and struggle.. this is a basic moral principle. put equality before the right to be greedy.
